effect: All moves used by the Pokémon become Normal-type and receive a 20% power boost.
synergies: benefits from Normal-type boosting items like Silk Scarf
ignores opponent's type resistances/immunities to original move types
notes: Makes the Pokémon weak to Fighting-type moves regardless of original typing. Overrides type-changing effects like Soak. Most effective on Pokémon with diverse movepools lacking STAB.
